channeldata.description: The MaLTPyNT (Matteo’s Libraries and Tools in Python for NuSTAR Timing) suite is designed for the quick-look timing analysis of NuSTAR data. It treats properly orbital gaps (e.g., occultation, SAA passages) and performs the standard aperiodic timing analysis (power density spectrum, lags, etc.), plus the cospectrum, a proxy for the power density spectrum that uses the signals from two detectors instead of a single one.
channeldata.summary: "Matteo's library and tools in Python for NuSTAR timing"
